dialogue: 'There's this little Caterpie that's been hanging around my vegetable garden. I should shoo him off, but he's so darn cute. I've already named him... My vegetables are doomed.'
'Don’t think about leaving Falnook without having some coffee!'
'This morning my husband said it was 'a little muggy out,' and I went outside, and he'd put all of our mugs on the lawn... now there's Caterpie silk in all of them...'
'There was some little girl selling hair dye earlier...it’s nice seeing entrepreneurship starting young!'
'There's this old house tucked away in Fomelhaut Forest that people say is haunted. I think it's just weird.'
'If you see the Croft family around, give them a helping hand would you? So many kids in one household... I don't know how that boy manages it.'
'They used to mine for super-cool minerals called star pieces and stardust in Fomelhaut Forest!'
'“I always knew Maisie was behind the Team Null incidents! Juli to the rescue!”'
'Just once I would like to live somewhere where nothing weird happens.'
'So…I saw a cloaked person following you. That’s really weird,right?'
'I can't believe Maisie was behind Team Null... I had such a crush on her...'
'I threw my Levna League cards in the trash, with Maisie arrested they lost all value to me...'
'Maisie's still hot. If not more hot. I could fix her
'Who do you think is prettier now, since Maisie's out of the running? Ariea or Juli?
'I can excuse terrorism, but lying to us is so mean!'
'So the Crown Badge I got from Maisie is worthless??'
'So the Champion wasn't behind Team Null after all. Unless *Maisie* is the champion. I've still got it!'
So your badges were real all along...
quests: 'Please stop crying, I can't take much more of this…'
'How am I supposed to make more hairdye without the ingredients...?'
